title: Einride
description: Einride is a technology company that develops and provides freight mobility solutions based on electric and autonomous vehicles, leading the transition to sustainable transport.  Its mission is to accelerate the world’s transition to a sustainable society by lowering the environmental impact of the global transport industry.  Einride is the world’s first company to operate an autonomous, all-electric freight vehicle on a commercial route on a public road with its groundbreaking Pod.
